nodes.text: In 1 ABY the Corellia Metropolitan reported from Theed on Naboo that heavy Imperial losses in the fight against the Rebel Alliance had led ex-Senator Mcnamara to call for a full troop withdrawal from the conflict to protect the lives of the Empire's soldiers from "terrorist attacks".
The senator is mentioned in a short news report on a Newsnet terminal in Star Wars Galaxies. It does not specify whether he was a member of the Galactic Senate or the Imperial Senate.
